Action.author: krw910
Action.body: After talking with Mike he needs the PROPOGATE and COMMIT information listed as INFO in the logs. On the commits we need to know if the commit succeeded or failed. If it failed to write we need some error in the logs showing why.

Action.author: vladimirwork
Action.body: Latest indy-node depends on 1.1.123 plenum, we should rebuild indy-node for 1.1.125 plenum to test this ticket.

Action.author: andkononykhin
Action.body: ~VladimirWork Indy-node 1.1.134 is available in master, it is linked with plenum 1.1.127.

Action.author: vladimirwork
Action.body: ORDER -> COMMIT *info* messages for valid requests - DISCARD *info* messages for invalid client-to-node requests - DISCARD / FAILED *warning* messages for invalid node-to-node requests >
